changes: Added triggerCellTap() call in onEnd handler of cell tap event

patterns_discovered: Using separate haptic utility functions for different interaction types
Importing haptic trigger functions from a centralized utils file
Triggering haptics after successful hit testing of a cell
gotchas_discovered: Need to ensure haptic feedback is triggered only on successful cell interactions
Importance of importing the correct haptic utility function for each interaction type

approach_outcome.description: Added haptic feedback for cell tap with medium impact

recommendations: Consider creating a comprehensive haptic feedback strategy across the app
Potentially create an enum or configuration for different haptic intensities
Document the usage of haptic utility functions for consistency
